text: @realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Speaking of pizza, Herman Cain just died of coronavirus. You know, the guy you had speaking at your rally about how people shouldn't wear masks? The rally where more than a dozen of your staff tested positive for covid? Your negligence and incompetence just killed a man.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
